title: Secure User Login
description: As a customer, I want to log into the portal securely using multifactor authentication, so that my account remains protected against unauthorized access.
attributes_and_rules: Multifactor authentication must include OTP, biometric, or email verification.
acceptance_criteria: Given a registered user, When the user logs in, Then the user must complete multifactor authentication before accessing the account.

test_cases.Then: the user must complete multifactor authentication before accessing the account.

title: Adaptive UI Layout
description: As a customer, I want the portal layout to automatically adjust to my device so that I have a seamless viewing experience.
attributes_and_rules: UI components must adapt seamlessly between desktop, tablet, and mobile.
acceptance_criteria: Given the different devices, When accessing the portal, Then the layout should automatically adjust to the device providing a seamless experience.

test_cases.Then: the layout should automatically adjust to the device providing a seamless experience.

title: User-Specific Dashboard
description: As a customer, I want to see personalized information such as my accounts and eligible products so that I can manage my finances efficiently.
attributes_and_rules: Dashboard must display relevant banking products and account details based on the user's profile.
acceptance_criteria: Given a logged-in customer, When accessing the dashboard, Then it should display information specific to the customer’s account and services.

test_cases.Then: it should display information specific to the customer’s account and services.

epic_title: Account Requests and Service Modification Workflows
title: Submit Account Requests
description: As a customer, I want to open new accounts via the portal so that I don’t need to visit the bank branch.
attributes_and_rules: Account creation process must be streamlined and efficient.
acceptance_criteria: Given a customer, When submitting an account request, Then the process should allow for efficient completion without branch visits.

test_cases.Then: the process should allow for efficient completion without branch visits.

title: Track Service Request Status
description: As a customer, I want to track the status of my service requests in real time so that I stay informed.
attributes_and_rules: Real-time updates must be visible on the dashboard and via email notifications.
acceptance_criteria: Given a submitted service request, When tracking it, Then the customer should receive real-time updates on the progress.

test_cases.Then: the customer should receive real-time updates on the progress.

title: Upload Banking Documents
description: As a customer, I want to upload supporting documents directly from the portal so that my account requests can be processed faster.
attributes_and_rules: Document upload process must ensure encryption and data privacy compliance.
acceptance_criteria: Given a customer request, When uploading documents, Then they should be securely processed and stored.

test_cases.Then: they should be securely processed and stored.

title: Implement User Permissions
description: As an admin, I want to create and assign user roles so that customers can only access relevant sections of the portal.
attributes_and_rules: User roles and permissions must be meticulously assigned based on access requirements.
acceptance_criteria: Given an admin logged in, When creating user roles, Then permissions should be assigned accurately according to access needs.

test_cases.Then: permissions should be assigned accurately according to access needs.

title: Synchronize Customer Data
description: As a developer, I want to synchronize customer data via APIs so that all systems display consistent information.
attributes_and_rules: Integration must be reliable and ensure data consistency between systems.
acceptance_criteria: Given integration layers, When synchronizing data, Then information should remain consistent across all platforms.

test_cases.Then: information should remain consistent across all platforms

title: Encrypt User Data
description: As a system, I want to store user information in encrypted form so that sensitive data is protected from breaches.
attributes_and_rules: Encryption methods must comply with data regulations and standards.
acceptance_criteria: Given user data storage, When encrypting information, Then it should be protected and compliant with regulations.

test_cases.Then: it should be protected and compliant with regulations.
